description:
The Summit High Trail Run Short Sleeve Tee is designed for high-performance on the trails. With moisture-wicking FlashDry-Pro™ fabrics, a slim fit, and mobility-enhancing features, it's your ideal companion for longer runs and challenging terrain.

  • Slim fit and split hem for enhanced mobility on the trails
  • FlashDry-Pro™ materials keep you dry and comfortable during high-output activities
  • Darted seams provide a race-ready fit
  • Reflective heat transfer logos for increased visibility during low-light runs
name: The North Face Summit High Trail Run Short Sleeve Tee - Men's
